name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 11, Renjing.com published an article by He Xuefeng, Dean of the School of Social Sciences at Wuhan University, titled "Why has targeted poverty alleviation fallen into formalism?" The article states that the author visited and investigated seven villages in two townships and found that the real poor households in the villages came from families with no labor force due to serious illness or disability. Such families, no matter how much effort they put in, still have to rely on social security to provide a safety net in the end. As a result, in the past five years, in order to accurately target households and individuals for targeted poverty alleviation, almost all administrative and financial resources of counties, towns and villages have been occupied. Most of these resources have been wasted on infinitely complicated formalisms that should not be done to meet inspections and to conform to logic.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens reported that small cards for downloading anti-censorship software appeared on shared bicycles in Guangzhou.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of September 12, multiple flights were delayed again at Tianjin Binhai Airport.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Currently, searches related to "Cambodia Canal" have been blocked on TikTok, Baidu, and 360.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
In the early morning of September 12, the leaders of the Zhujiang Branch of Tianjin University of Finance and Economics led more than 40 social personnel to emptied the supermarket on campus.
According to the person in charge of the supermarket, they have been operating this supermarket for 16 years. This year, the school contracted the supermarket to others without prior notice. After negotiations failed, the underworld surrounded the students at the entrance of the supermarket, which caused his wife to miscarry.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 12, Reuters reported that according to two people familiar with the matter, Evergrande Group Chairman Xu Jiayin is currently being detained in a special detention center in Shenzhen.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The measures for delaying the retirement age were announced: the statutory retirement age for men will be gradually adjusted to 63 years old, for female cadres to 58 years old, and for female employees to 55 years old.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 13, the Military Representative Conference of the General Office of the Central Military Commission decided to remove Li Shangfu from his position as a representative of the 14th National People's Congress.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 13, the Chinese Embassy in the United States published five articles in a row to emphasize Sino-US relations.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The Financial Times reported that in 2018, 51,302 startups were established in China throughout the year, and by 2023, the number had dropped to 1,202. Sequoia Capital, Hillhouse Capital, 5Y Capital and others have either increased their overseas investments or more actively sought deal opportunities in markets such as the United States and Europe. A senior executive in Shanghai said: "People are voting with their feet." He said that since his team and investments are all in China, he has no choice but to stay. "I am like the Titanic, raising the flag as the ship sinks."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 12, Kunshan, Jiangsu. A report online said someone hanged himself at the Baimajing Road bus stop.
